Hey @realDonaldTrump, if you care about giving kids a safe, healthy life in schools and communities, why don’t you do anything to address gun violence? #SOTU

The President (and the GOP Senate) have ignored House-passed bills to:

- Lower drug prices
- Fight corruption
- Secure our elections
- Rejoin the Paris Agreement
- Protect DREAMers
- Address gun violence

He’s giving a speech as if a coequal branch of government doesn’t exist.

Trump is telling a sad and wrenching story about gun violence but as president he hasn’t done anything to stem the nation’s gun violence epidemic. 

Because. He. Doesn’t. Care. #SOTU

President Trump just used the #SOTU as an excuse to blame America’s gun violence crisis on immigrants. 

100 Americans are shot and killed every day. If President Trump wants to do something about it, he should pass gun safety laws like background checks on all gun sales.

text: While Trump calls out the less than 1% terrible situation with a criminal immigrant, he ignores gun violence that kills 40,000 Americans a year. #StateOfTheUnion
